welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chatham, where history and charm come together in a picturesque setting. Explore our historic dockyards, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals as you enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport is a modern and compact building, providing a seamless travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
